Coronation Street's Simon Gregson was quizzed by officers in the back of a police van after a bust-up in a Merseyside Toby Carvery following Ladies Day at Aintree.

articles.author: Hannah Bray
articles.title: Richard Osman’s replacement on Pointless 'most likely' to be Countdown star - Express
articles.description: RICHARD OSMAN announced on Friday he is leaving the BBC One game show Pointless after 13 years, but a Countdown star has been tipped as the new replacement host.

articles.author: Helen Kelly
articles.title: Bargain Hunt's Eric stunned as team make history but are penalised for breaking show rules - Express
articles.description: BARGAIN HUNT viewers saw history made on the latest episode of the BBC series with host Eric Knowles breaking the news to the red team's Geraldine and Washington.
